name: UGeometryCacheComponent
doc: GeometryCacheComponent, encapsulates a GeometryCache asset instance and implements functionality for rendering/and playback of GeometryCaches

bExtrapolateFrames: Enable frame extrapolation for sub-frame sampling of non-constant topologies with imported motion vectors
bOverrideWireframeColor: Do we override the wireframe rendering color?
GeometryCache: Geometry Cache instance referenced by the component

methods.name: GetAnimationTime
methods.doc: Set the current animation time for GeometryCache. Includes the influence of elapsed time and SetStartTimeOffset

methods.name: GetDuration
methods.doc: Get the duration of the playback

methods.name: GetMotionVectorScale
methods.doc: Get the motion vector scale.

methods.name: GetNumberOfFrames
methods.doc: Get the number of frames

methods.name: GetOverrideWireframeColor
methods.doc: Check whether we are overriding the wireframe color or not.

methods.name: GetPlaybackDirection
methods.doc: Set the current animation time for GeometryCache. Includes the influence of elapsed time and SetStartTimeOffset

methods.name: GetPlaybackSpeed
methods.doc: Get current playback speed for GeometryCache.

methods.name: GetStartTimeOffset
methods.doc: Get current start time offset for GeometryCache.

methods.name: GetWireframeOverrideColor
methods.doc: Get the wireframe override color, used when overriding the wireframe color is enabled.

methods.name: IsExtrapolatingFrames
methods.doc: Get whether this GeometryCache is extrapolating frames.

methods.name: IsLooping
methods.doc: Get whether this GeometryCache is looping or not.

methods.name: IsPlaying
methods.doc: Get whether this GeometryCache is playing or not.

methods.name: IsPlayingReversed
methods.doc: Get whether this GeometryCache is playing in reverse or not.

methods.name: Pause
methods.doc: Pause playback of GeometryCache

methods.name: Play
methods.doc: Start playback of GeometryCache

methods.name: PlayFromStart
methods.doc: Start playback of GeometryCache from the start

methods.name: PlayReversed
methods.doc: Start playback of GeometryCache in reverse

methods.name: PlayReversedFromEnd
methods.doc: Start playback of GeometryCache from the end and play in reverse

methods.name: SetExtrapolateFrames
methods.doc: Set whether this GeometryCache is extrapolating frames.

methods.name: SetGeometryCache
methods.doc: Change the Geometry Cache used by this instance.

methods.name: SetLooping
methods.doc: Set whether this GeometryCache is looping or not.

methods.name: SetMotionVectorScale
methods.doc: Set new motion vector scale.

methods.name: SetOverrideWireframeColor
methods.doc: Override wireframe color?

methods.name: SetPlaybackSpeed
methods.doc: Set new playback speed for GeometryCache.

methods.name: SetStartTimeOffset
methods.doc: Set current start time offset for GeometryCache.

methods.name: SetWireframeOverrideColor
methods.doc: Set the color, used when overriding the wireframe color is enabled.

methods.name: Stop
methods.doc: Stop playback of GeometryCache
